full_description:
Apple iMac M3 Chip 256GB SSD 24" 4.5K Retina Display Green All-in-One PC (Late 2023)

The Apple iMac All-In-One PC has a compact footprint and a thin side profile, measuring only 11.5mm. The Apple M3 chip powers it, combining the CPU, GPU, Neural Engine, I/O, and other components into a single system on a chip (SoC). Built on 3nm process technology, the Apple M3 delivers the performance you need without sacrificing power efficiency. The 8-core CPU includes four performance cores and four efficiency cores, making it up to 35% faster in CPU performance than the M1. The M3 also supports up to 24GB of unified memory. The Apple iMac M3 Chip All-In-One PC features a 24-inch Retina display with a brightness of 500 nits. The Retina Display's resolution is 4480 x 2520 at 218 pixels per inch (ppi). It also supports the P3 wide color gamut, which contains 25% more colors than the widely used sRGB range. The display's gamma, white point, and primary color calibrations are perfect at the factory. The screen includes an anti-reflective coating to reduce light glare. The 24-inch Apple iMac AIO PC may connect to the internet using a Gigabit Ethernet cable or Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax). It can also connect to Bluetooth 5.3-enabled wireless peripherals and accessories. The two Thunderbolt 3 ports can link in full 6K resolution to a single Apple Pro Display XDR in addition to supporting USB 4. Additionally, the two USB 3 ports support up to 10 Gb/s with the right devices. With the M3 chip's most modern camera ISP, Apple also integrated a Full HD 1080p FaceTime HD camera, enabling sharper images and more detail in the highlights and shadows during video calls. The outstanding signal-to-noise ratio and directional beamforming of the studio-quality three-mic array enable clear calls and recordings. Another feature of the iMac is a high-fidelity six-speaker system with force-canceling woofers. For movies with Dolby Atmos support, the iMac allows spatial audio and provides broad stereo sound.

It's up to two times faster than the previous generation with M1. You will notice M3's speed and power in everything they do, from multitasking across regular work programs to exploring creative interests such as editing high-resolution images or multiple streams of 4K video. Featuring the next-generation GPU of M3, iMac offers hardware-accelerated mesh shading and ray tracing, offering more accurate lighting, reflections, and shadows for incredibly realistic gaming experiences, and making three-dimensional design and production even faster. With a 16-core Neural Engine and the most recent media engine, the iMac also provides lightning-fast machine learning and video performance. For Intel-based upgraders, the iMac with M3 provides a significant improvement in performance and features. Upgraders will see 4x quicker performance than the most powerful 21.5-inch iMac model and up to 2.5x better performance when compared to the most popular 27-inch iMac models.2 They'll enjoy the immersive 24-inch, 4.5K Retina display with 11.3 million pixels, which is the ideal size and resolution to replace both the 4K and 5K Intel-based models in an even more adaptable design. Upgraders also gain access to the industry's best cameras, speakers, and microphones, as well as sophisticated Apple silicon technologies such as the Neural Engine and media engine, and the ability to use Touch ID. You can look and sound their best whether taking calls from home or the office thanks to the iMac's unparalleled video conferencing experience, which includes a 1080p FaceTime camera and studio-quality microphones. The Apple iMac has been engineered to have as little environmental impact as possible. The new iMac with M3 is constructed using 100% recycled aluminum in the stand, recycled rare earth magnets, recycled tin soldering on several printed circuit boards, and, in a first for iMac, 100% recycled gold plating on multiple printed circuit boards. Apple iMac is also free of various dangerous compounds, including beryllium, brominated flame retardants, and mercury, and all of the wood fiber in the packaging is recycled or sourced from responsibly managed forests. With Continuity, iMac provides a seamless experience with iPhone and other Apple devices on a large, gorgeous screen. Users can send a message or answer a phone call directly from their iMac, or scan a document with their iPhone and have it display instantaneously on their iMac. They may also use Universal Clipboard to easily copy photos, video, or text from one app on their iPhone and smoothly paste them into another app on a nearby MacBook. Together with the iPhone, iMac provides an unparalleled experience. The iMac delivers powerful, room-filling sounds to any space. Two pairs of force-cancelling woofers produce deep bass and are paired with high-performance tweeters to create a large soundstage that enhances music, movies, and other media. Dolby Atmos spatial audio is also supported by iMac. Adding a 4.5K Retina display to that makes it feel like you're bringing the theater home. The trackpad, mouse, and keyboard on the iMac are all the same color. You can swap users, download apps, utilize Apple Pay, and safely unlock your iMac with the Magic Keyboard with Touch ID. Additionally, navigating is made simple and easy by the Magic Mouse and Magic Trackpad.
